articles.title: HSBC shares in Hong Kong up 2.7% after pre-tax profit in the first quarter beat expectations - CNBC
articles.description: The London-headquartered bank, which makes most of its revenue in Asia, said its reported profit before tax rose to $5.8 billion.
articles.content:
